thread.section_title: Citadines Trafalgar Square London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pretty good experience
thread.title_full: Pretty good experience - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Harry R
title: Pretty good experience
text:
Pretty decent hotel; I thought the price was fair based on the amenities, room, etc.
Great location, too! Near Trafalgar Square, the National Gallery, the London Eye, Westminster Abbey, etc. The hallways on my floor looked a little dirty, but nothing too crazy.
Overall, I'd recommend this hotel and would stay here again.
